column4: CLI Q: Someone told me once about a program that would take two binary files and compare them and show the differences. Anybody know what I'm talking about? Like if I have two identical files but with slightly different metadata or encoded data,e tc
in general you are talking about a checksum
- thanks but I'm not sure I explained properly. I don't want to see if the files are identical binary copies... I want to see specifics on all the areas of difference
